metadata.title: CVE-2017-12165 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
It was discovered that Undertow before 1.4.17, 1.3.31 and 2.0.0 processes http request headers with unusual whitespaces which can cause possible http request smuggling.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libundertow-java - 2.0.23-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: undertow package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.23-1').
